location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Acting Deputy Adjutant General, Poona to Captain Lewis Pelly, 17th Regiment Native Infantry, Dapoorie [Dapuri]

mods.abstract: Letter in response to Pelly's letter of 27 July 1861 informing him that his name is being submitted to Government to enter the Staff Corps with the rank of Major and that the rank will be postdated from the 18 February 1861.
